entry.title: The Looney's Clean
entry.content:
sigh I'm a little disappointed that Canada ISN'T the smart little sister, but still the dumb young kid brother...

Official report of Canada 'spy' coins not true: U.S.

entry.title: I Always Thought that Polar Bear Looked Suspicious, and Don't Get Me Started on the Loon...
entry.content:
I gotta say, I'm a little proud (and a tad weirded out) when I read this story:

Pocketful of Espionage: Beware the Spy Coin Bet the US never thought we had it in us, hey?Â  Kind of like when you find out your little sister's been reading your diary and replacing that hair you put across page 42 to detect intruders...

Now, I must go to Tim Horton's and spend whatever change I have... can't be too careful.
